alert.note: Alert for Chester; Delaware (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:16PM EDT until June 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chester County in southeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Delaware County in southeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 415 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Westtown, or near West Chester, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... West Chester, Westtown, Gradyville, Cheyney, Elam, Marshallton, Lima, Concordville, West Goshen, Media, Chester Heights, Upper Providence Township and Exton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
